msbt.message: Horseshoe crabs look so cool! I wonder if it'd let me wear it like a helmet, .
Sea pineapples have some serious style. That thing looks like it's all set to rock the crowd, .
Sometimes I wish I was a lobster. I'd be bright red and pinch stuff that gets in my way or makes me angry.Everyone would be like, "Yeah, that's just being !" That'd be rad!
Gigas giant clams are creepy! I keep thinkin' it's gonna, like, leap at the glass or something, .
Wow! That thing looks WAY different than a regular octopus. It's cute too, in a slithery kinda way, .
For being called a red king crab, it's not very kingly. Or red, for that matter, .Hmm I guess maybe it only turns red when it's angry. So it's basically my mom. Bwa ha ha!
As chill as it is to watch this jellyfish do its thing, I'm pretty sure I'd panic if I saw one while I was swimming.
Wonder how many payments that chambered nautilus has left on its shell, . I can relate
Ha! The only way spider crabs could be any more awesome is if they spun little water webs to catch stuff. Cool!
Someone told me giant isopods are, like, the vacuum cleaners of the sea.Maybe it could do my place next, ! Bwa ha ha!
This was your donation, huh? Cool! Bet it took some serious diving to get, . You rock!
